meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the animal life of a particular region
meanings.sent1: The faunistic diversity in the forest amazed the researchers.

meanings.sent3: The faunistic patterns in the zoo made the visitors smile.
meanings.sent4: Her paintings captured the faunistic essence of the savannah.
meanings.sent5: The guide described the faunistic features of the ecosystem vividly.

meanings.definition: The study of animal life in a particular region
meanings.sent1: She specialized in faunistic research in the rainforest.
meanings.sent2: The book on faunistic provided valuable insights into wildlife.
